document_data.name: Uligar
document_data.mainbody: '''Uligar''' was the chieftain of the [[Bleeding Eye]] [[orc]] tribe that raided the road of [[Kuldahar Pass]] in the 11{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Uligar carried a ''[[wand of trap detection]]'', an [[axe]], a scroll of ''[[blur]]'', and several [[gold]] [[coin]]s.
document_data.History: In [[Eleint]] of the {{YearlinkName|1281}},, the Bleeding Eye orcs and a tribe of [[goblins]] allied with them raided the traders passing through Kuldahar Pass, between [[Easthaven]] and a small town of [[Kuldahar]]. During the avalanche in Kuldahar Pass, Uligar and his raiders killed [[Jermsy|Jermsy's]] family that owned a mill outside of Kuldahar and used it as a base.
